summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department; authorizing the Superintendent to enter into three related agreements with the Bonneville Power Administration allowing for greater reliability of the interconnected transmission system by providing for Bonneville's use of the Maple Valley to Sno-King 230 kV line\#1 and the Maple Valley to Sno-King 230 kV line \#2 owned by City Light and by providing for improved transmission reliability on Bonneville's system from the Boundary Project.
